title: Designing, developing, and deploying artificial intelligence systems: Lessons from and for the public sector
research_description: This study examines AI systems in the public sector and highlights lessons learned in the design, development, and deployment phases. It discusses critical issues such as transparency, public value, and complexity.
research_results: The findings emphasize the importance of aligning AI deployment with public good, transparency, and governance. They also outline challenges related to data availability and organizational capabilities.
future_research: Future research could explore empirical studies on the long-term impact of AI systems in different public sector contexts.
